mapper.sql: select row_number() over(ORDER BY board_no asc) as rnum, board_no, board_title, board_content, board_time, hits from juiceta_board
mapper.update: update juiceta_board set board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent} where board_No = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into juiceta_board(board_no,board_title, board_content, board_time) values (juiceta_board_seq.nextval,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},sysdate)
